Von Bauer Chateau
Setup
Magic users can check when they enter the yard, Perception vs DC 10. If they succeed they feel a brief movement over them as a veil being pulled past their faces.
Chateau von Bauer, situated in High Town. In the inner city, surrounded by walls. Lots of city guards. It's a four story, large house with a large stairwell in the middle.
Everyone is in the main hall. That's the only place there's any lights. They can see the lights from the stairwell.
Out: Guards turn up. Trial.
The Main Hall
Versullio, Roland's Tutor (Shape shifting, Illithid) with the Tongue of the Gatewalkers. The family is sitting at the table. Their meal uneaten. The servants are standing in the back. All are possessed by Pilichin the Phage.
"We've been expecting you?". Playing for time so the guards can get here. Will try and bribe them.
